Brocky was raised in luxury and privilege, but he was always aware of the elven blood in his veins. His mother would tell him stories of her homeland and he would often daydream about adventuring in the wilds of Faerun. When he was old enough, he convinced his parents to send him to a prestigious elven academy in the city of Silverymoon.

Brocky excelled in his studies and quickly became one of the top students in his class. He developed a keen interest in magic and history, and he dreamed of one day becoming a great wizard like his mother's people. However, his plans were derailed when his parents were killed in a freak accident. For the next few years, Brocky devoted himself to his family's business interests and to Waterdhavian politics. He quickly rose through the ranks of the nobility and became one of the most powerful men in the city. But Brocky's heart was never in it.
